wargame.unit.AI

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.unit.AI.AI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIBird, AIBowman, AIKnight, AISoldier, AIWizard

    public abstract class AI
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAI
    That class regroup methods and attribute common with all AI
    Author:
    Romain Pelegrin
